title: Visa application processes around the world: the key things to check before you travel
text:
The world of travel documentation is a confusing and fast-moving one.

Very few countries have exactly the same requirements of entry, and many change their rules on an almost annual basis.

Below we have listed the most up-to-date information on how to prepare the documents you need for your holiday, from Argentina to Zambia and everywhere in between (including the EU).

All the information below applies to British nationals but is liable to change at short notice. Always check with the embassy of the country you are travelling to, your tour operator or travel agent and Foreign Office advice before travelling or applying for a visa.

Argentina

Official website

A visa is not necessary for a tourism visit of less than 90 days. If you wish to extend your stay seek advice from the Argentine Migrations Office.
description: Information on visa applications for travel to countries around the world, including Russia, the USA and India
